Introduction

Wong Kahei, known under her stage name ViVi, is a Hong Kongese singer-songwriter and model under CTDENM. She is the oldest member of the girl group Loossemble. She is a former member of the girl group LOONA, and its sub-unit LOONA 1/3.

According to the LOONAverse she lives on Earth along with HeeJin, HyunJin, HaSeul, and YeoJin.

She was born in 1996 in Hong Kong and has two younger siblings: her sister was born in 2000 and her brother in 2008. She dreamed of becoming a K-pop star after watching BIGBANG and 2NE1’s music videos.

She used to work as a freelance model under the name Vivian Wong from 2011 to 2016. She took part in various modeling projects, such as a Blush Cosmetics video tutorial and a PlayStation model at the Asia Game Show 2012. She also appeared in some short YouTube skits, which presumably were with her friends.

On February 14, 2017, she was introduced as a member and released her solo single album “ViVi” on April 17. She debuted in LOONA on August 20, 2018, with their debut mini album "[+ +]". However, she parted ways with BlockBerryCreative after a legal dispute.

On June 11, 2023, it was announced that she signed an exclusive contract with CTDENM. On July 29, It was also confirmed that she would debut as a member of Loossemble alongside some of the other members of her former group. On September 15th, 2023, she debuted as a member of Loossemble with a mini album of the same name.
